welcome_message_body: Welcome to Raleigh, a charming city known for its historic neighborhoods, vibrant arts scene, and delicious Southern cuisine. We invite you to explore our city and enjoy all it has to offer!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for airlines such as Delta, Southwest, and United.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as American, JetBlue, and Frontier.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
